## Automatically render many tables

```{python}
#| eval: true
#| echo: false
#| output: asis
csv_files = glob.glob('../results/*.csv')
markdown_chunks = []
for file_name in csv_files:
    title = os.path.splitext(os.path.basename(file_name))[0].replace('_', ' ').capitalize()
    print(title)
    markdown_chunks.append(f'### {title}')
    markdown_chunks.append(pd.read_csv(file_name).to_markdown(index=False))
Markdown('\n\n'.join(markdown_chunks))
```
